fields.name: lockoutTime
fields.title: lockoutTime
fields.description: The date and time that this account was locked out.

fields.name: logonCount
fields.title: logonCount
fields.description: The number of times the account has successfully logged on.

fields.name: enabled
fields.title: enabled
fields.description: Indicates whether a user is enabled or not.

fields.name: lastLogon
fields.title: lastLogon
fields.description: The last time and date the user logged on.

fields.name: groups
fields.title: Groups
fields.description: A collection of groups where user belongs.

fields.name: userFlags
fields.title: userFlags
fields.description: This field contains additional user flags.
